item.title: Kotonoha Akane & Aoi Yukata Ver. Microfiber Towel Pre-Orders Open!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:

The post Kotonoha Akane & Aoi Yukata Ver. Microfiber Towel Pre-Orders Open! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s time for Kotonoha Akane and Aoi fans to arise once more, as we have a new adorable official item now available from their official webstore!

A Yukata-themed Microfiber Towel

The Kotonoha sisters today showed us their new  featuring the two of them in a cute yukata outfit!

【拡散希望】描き下ろし浴衣姉妹ほぼ等身大マイクロファイバータオル予約開始！★予約期間7月29日（月）13:00まで。https://t.co/oIaQxTrSqY pic.twitter.com/MtAdD4SOPj

— 琴葉茜葵 (@kotonoha0425) July 17, 2019

They look absolutely adorable in that attire, isn’t it? The above item’s size is 118x160cm, which makes the two characters appear at almost their life-size!

Being perfect as a towel, a summer blanket or even just as decoration for your room, this microfiber towel is priced 8,640 JPY!

You can find and pre-order it here! Pre-orders will close on July 29th so you need to be fast to get it!

Please be aware that you might need some help to obtain this item outside Japan!

Source

Enchanted by such an amazing illustration turned in a life-size towel like this, we hope to see more items coming from the Kotonoha twins in the future! And you guys?

Don’t forget to follow us on our social medias for more amazing news!

Kotonoha Akane and Aoi have a Twitter account, a Facebook page and an Official Website
The Kotonoha sisters also have an official webstore!

The post Kotonoha Akane & Aoi Yukata Ver. Microfiber Towel Pre-Orders Open! appeared first on VNN.
